data.title: remove gcc comipling flag
data.body: Now we change to use clang, and these flags are for gcc.

data.title: fix TTF and BMFont word wrap
TTF and BMFont label word wrap issue
data.body: 1. when the label width is less than a word's boundary, we should change the wrap mode from word wrap to char wrap.

data.title: Fix -Wsometimes-uninitialized warning in release build
data.body:
This PR fixes the following `-Wsometimes-uninitialized` warning when compiling `libcocos2d` in release mode with Xcode 7.3/Clang. Thanks!

```
cocos/base/allocator/CCAllocatorStrategyGlobalSmallBlock.h:183:9: Variable 'address' is used uninitialized whenever switch default is taken
cocos/base/allocator/CCAllocatorGlobalNewDelete.cpp:27:10: In file included from cocos/base/allocator/CCAllocatorGlobalNewDelete.cpp:27:
cocos/base/allocator/CCAllocatorStrategyGlobalSmallBlock.h:193:16: Uninitialized use occurs here
cocos/base/allocator/CCAllocatorStrategyGlobalSmallBlock.h:167:22: Initialize the variable 'address' to silence this warning
```

data.title: [Android][Cocos2dx v3.9] Crashes Android app with Android 6.0 (Api 23) !
data.body:
Hi all, I also crashes when I run app with error : 
E/AndroidRuntime(11959): java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: dlopen failed: cannot locate symbol "rand" referenced by "libcocos2djs.so"...
E/AndroidRuntime(11959): at java.lang.Runtime.loadLibrary(Runtime.java:361)
E/AndroidRuntime(11959): at java.lang.System.loadLibrary(System.java:525)

I'm using cocos 3.9, NDK R10e and target SDK is 23 (Android 6.0). I want use Android 6.0 because I use android-support-v7-appcompat for new api of Google SignIn.
Can you help me fix this issue?
Thank you!

data.title: Fix possible memory leak when pass initialization fails
data.body: This patch fixes two possible memory leaks if `pass` initialisation fails. Thanks.

data.title: Fix CCController-android symbols not being exported to the Java side.
data.body: Now that cocos2dxandroid_static is used to export symbols to the Java side, CCController-android.cpp must be included in it for GameControllerAdapter.java to work correctly, otherwise android does not find the symbols for the JNI calls.

data.title: V3: updated to support Windows 10 UWP x64 builds
data.body:
This pull request includes the following:
- Adds support to build x64 version of Windows 10 UWP (x64 support depends on PR https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x-3rd-party-libs-bin/pull/230) This will be needed to build Windows 10 UWP versions for Xbox.
- Updates libcocos2d name to 3.12 (needed for Windows Store version tracking)
- Adds missing OpenGL defines in winrt/CCGL.h

data.title: Crash (JSB) when action sequence contains an action with easing
data.body: Seen in versions: cocos2d-x v3.11.1, and latest from v3 branch. The crash is shown in the attached XCode screenshot. The access violation happens if garbage collection take place. To reproduce, create a new js project using cocos command line, and in app.js, add the following before the end of the HelloWorldLayer constructor: ``` this.sprite.runAction( cc.sequence( cc.rotateBy(2, 90).easing(cc.easeElasticInOut(0.5)), cc.rotateBy(0.5, 90) ).repeatForever() ); cc.sys.garbageCollect(); ``` This crashes if easing function called, otherwise it does not. Note, this is a trivial example to show the issue. This is causing crashes all over our game which is being upgraded from v3.9 to v3.11 (works fine on v3.9). For example, garbage collection is requested whenever a scene transition finishes, so any actions with easing that are created within the incoming scene will cause this crash.

data.title: [ci skip]hide virtual button if has focus
Hide virtual button
data.body:
Some Android devices, such as huawei phones, use virtual menu button. We should hide it to make game full scree, or it will have black blocks occupied by the virtual menu button like this(right area is black):

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/488203/16072807/49f05586-3315-11e6-810d-ef55180d1db4.png)

data.title: fix: missing properties for clone
data.body: ui::Widget missing CascadeColorEnabled and CascadeOpacityEnabled for clone.

data.title: [android] Video/GameView region is wrong after unlocking screen
data.body:
Reported by @chuanweizhang2013
### How to Reproduce ?
- Engine version: 3.x
- Platform: Android
- Landscape game
- Playing a video in game
- Lock screen
- Unlock screen before the video ends
- Result: Show only 1/4 region of video, and game view is probably 1/4.

![1787727740602657fb6799fdee32843c](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/493372/16066329/c687a1b6-32e4-11e6-9021-e4605a925f5c.jpg)

data.title: Cleanup and refactor RootViewController
lua binding : Rename end() to endToLua().
data.body: There're still some end() functions need to rename to endToLua(), such as AudioEngine::end() and GLView::end(). And the way RenderTexture used to rename end() is out-of-date, so I changed it too.Please review this patch. Thanks.

data.title: Various CMake improvements
data.body:
- Added c++_shared (LLVM) to Android toolchain options. Fixed AndroidNdkGdb.cmake.
- Fixed includes when not using prebuilt libs. Added option to use sources in external when not using prebuilt libs.
- Added option in CMake to be able build Box2D without using it as physics library in cocos2d-x (similar to what is done in the Visual Studio solution).
